title: National Judicial (Policy Making) Committee Ordinance, 2002
description: Official consolidated text of National Judicial (Policy Making) Committee Ordinance, 2002 (LXXI of 2002) published by The Pakistan Code (General Laws).

provisions.title: Section 1. Short title, extent and commencement.⎯(1) This Ordinance may be called the National
provisions.content:
Judicial (Policy Making) Committee Ordinance, 2002.⎯
(2) It extends to the whole of Pakistan.
(3) It shall come into force at once.

provisions.title: Section 2. Definitions.⎯ In this Ordinance, unless there is anything repugnant to the subject or
provisions.content:
context,⎯
(a)   “Commission” means the Law and Justice Commission of Pakistan
established under the Law and Justice Commission of Pakistan Ordinance,
1979 as amended;
(b)   “Committee” means the National Judicial (Policy Making) Committee
established under section 3;
(c)   “Chairman” means the Chairman of the Committee; and
(d)   “Fund” means the fund established under the Law and Justice
Commission of Pakistan Ordinance, 1979, as amended.

provisions.title: Section 3. Establishment of National Judicial (Policy Making) Committee.⎯ There shall be a
provisions.content:
National Judicial (Policy Making) Committee headed by Chief Justice of Pakistan, who shall be the
Chairman of the Committee, and comprising the Chief Justice, Federal Shariat Court and Chief
Justices of 1[* *] High Courts as its Members.

provisions.title: Section 4. Functions of the Committee.⎯ The Committee shall coordinate and harmonize judicial
provisions.content:
policy within the Court system, and in coordination with the Commission, ensure its implementation.
The Committee shall also perform the following functions, namely:⎯
(a)     improving the capacity and performance of the administration of justice;
(b)     setting performance standards for judicial officers and persons associated with
performance of judicial and quasi judicial functions;
(c)     improvement in the terms and conditions of service of judicial officers and court staff,
to ensure skilled and efficient judiciary; and
(d)     publication of the annual          or periodic      reports    of the Supreme
Court, Federal Shariat Court, High Courts and Courts subordinate to High Courts and
Administrative Courts and Tribunals.

provisions.title: Section 6. Constitution of sub
provisions.content:
committees.⎯ The Committee may constitute sub-committees
consisting of its one or more Members, as it deems fit, and may assign them any matter relevant to
the functions of the Committee.

provisions.title: Section 7. Reports.⎯ The Committee shall publish annual report of its activities and such other
provisions.content:
periodic or special reports relating to its functioning as it deems fit. The reports shall be submitted to
the President of Pakistan.

provisions.title: Section 9. Power to make rules. ⎯ The Committee may make rules of procedure for conduct or
provisions.content:
its business and discharge of its functions.
